criteria: All backend unit and integration tests passing; CI/CD pipeline successfully deploys to staging; All API endpoints documented in OpenAPI spec are reachable and pass smoke tests.
success_metrics: 90% of API endpoints passing automated smoke tests. Zero critical bugs found in staging.

criteria: Custom formula execution latency is < 500ms at P95; Full CRUD lifecycle for custom modes is E2E tested and passing; No security vulnerabilities found in sandbox implementation.
success_metrics: P95 latency NFR met. All security tests pass. 100% of custom mode user stories acceptance criteria met.

criteria: Application passes a full manual and automated WCAG 2.1 Level AA audit. All features are fully operable via keyboard only.
bypass_criteria: Only minor (level A) violations are acceptable with a remediation plan.
success_metrics: Zero critical or serious accessibility violations reported. 100% keyboard operability confirmed.
